text: Ara smarana karo! Tomara tadera theke ebam allah chara yadera tara upasana karata se-saba theke bicchinna hale, takhana tomara guhara dike asraya nile. Tomadera prabhu tomadera jan'ya tamra karuna bistara karalena, ebam tomadera jan'ya tairi karalena temadera kajakarma theke labhajanaka paristhiti.
